name: Dilox Dash
description:
Hope you enjoy Dilox Dash! 

Try to reach the end and unlock each character! They has their own music so be sure to listen them all!

(There's an autosave so don't be afraid of losing your progress)

This is my first game, and with the help of some friends (and some free assets too), we finally managed to upload it, we're very happy with the final result, and hope everyone likes it as much as we do!

Thanks to everyone, and comment anything that you want, any idea/help is appreciated :)
